title: A new, cheap iPhone from Apple?
contentencoded: Apple is expected to reveal new iPhones early next month. There are lots of rumors abound, but no official word yet on what new devices the company will release. The most futuristic rumor might be that the phone's home button will serve as a fingerprint scanner for security. But Apple's biggest move might actually be to offer a colorful, low end iPhone -- less durable, but also less expensive. Jacob Kasternakis, writer for The Verge, previews the possibilities for a new iPhone with Marketplace Tech.
teaser: Apple is expected to roll out new iPhones next month, and rumor has it a cheap one is on the way.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, August 13, 2013
